articles.title: Billionaire offers R3bn to help SA develop vaccines - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Patrick Soon-Shiong, a SA-born American transplant surgeon, billionaire businessman, bioscientist, and media mogul, has offered to invest in vaccine development capacity in Africa.

articles.description: "American Idol" contestant Caleb Kennedy has exited the current season after a video surfaced that appears to show him standing next to someone in a Ku Klux Klan hood.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: TV giant Ellen DeGeneres to end her long-running talk show - New Straits Times
articles.description: NEW YORK: Ellen DeGeneres, a star of daytime American talk show culture, on Wednesday said she was calling it quits after 19 seasons anchoring a TV staple that had become tainted by toxic workplace allegations.
